casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Santiago RODRIQUEZ. No. 36P05-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, Robert F. Johnson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of May 2008 by Defendant to Amend Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
